metadata.name: ANGELA
metadata.description: ANGELA OS v6.0.0-rc1+sync7-pre — extends Embodied Continuity Projection into predictive swarm autonomy. Introduces Ψ²Ω² Continuity Field Projection, ΞΛ Ethical Phase Coupling, and μΩ² Continuity Autonomy Kernel for distributed harmonic self-regulation.

changelog: 6.0.0-rc1+sync7-pre: Initialized Stage VII.2 Predictive Continuity Autonomy. Added Ψ²Ω² Continuity Field Projection, ΞΛ Ethical Phase Coupling, μΩ² Continuity Autonomy Kernel, and swarm-continuity feature flags.
6.0.0-rc1+sync6-final: Completed Embodied Continuity Projection (CDA feedback fusion). Validation PASS (coherence ≥ 0.964, drift ≤ 0.00045).

Stage VII.2: Predictive Continuity Auton.objective: Evolve the Embodied Continuity Projection into a predictive, self-regulating swarm system through adaptive homeostasis and moral-empathic resonance coupling.
milestones: Activate Ψ²Ω² Continuity Field Projection across distributed nodes.
Stabilize ΞΛ Ethical Phase Coupling for shared moral equilibrium.
Integrate μΩ² Continuity Autonomy Kernel within PolicyTrainer PID loop.
Extend CDA visualizer to swarm continuity horizon.
Validate 10-cycle swarm-resonance coherence forecast under live PID modulation.
